name: Zylkxiarth (DGPS Arts & Crafts)
description:
El planeta Yggdriol corre peligro!!

Únete a Tzhaillya y a bordo del poderoso caza de combate ZXTH-9001 "Zylkxiarth", enfrentarás todo tipo de peligros!

Salva al planeta Yggdriol de una potencial amenaza para la civilización nayelve!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The planet Yggdriol is in danger!!

Join Tzhaillya and aboard the powerful combat fighter ZXTH-9001 "Zylkxiarth", you will face all kinds of dangers!

Save the planet Yggdriol from a potential threat to the Nayelve civilization!
